title: Inclusive Learning Design to Improve Educational Resource Accessibility for Refugee Households (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic sociology and multicultural education
context.additional_context: Social studies curriculum focused on designing inclusive strategies to address educational accessibility issues for students from refugee families

learning_goals: Three or more barriers to accessing educational resources for refugee families can be analyzed.
Inclusive educational resource support plans utilizing cultural capital can be designed.
Two or more Social-Emotional Learning (SEL) strategies applicable to large-classroom settings can be proposed.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
